app.logics.board

Interface IBoard

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Board, EnemyBoard, MyBoard

    public interface IBoard
extends java.io.Serializable
    An interface that represents Board with ships
    Author:
    Artur Vitt

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String fire(int i, char a)
      Performs action of shooting, returns message such as "Miss", "Hit", "You sank my battleship" ,"All ships destroyed", "Wrong Address, must be 1-10, a-j,A-J"
      java.lang.String fire(int i, int a)
      Performs action of shooting, returns message such as "Miss", "Hit", "You sank my battleship" ,"All ships destroyed", "Wrong Address, must be 1-10, a-j,A-J".
      int[][] getBoardState()
      Returns table state, value 1 represents attacked squires, value 2 successful hit, value 0 unaffected sector
      boolean[][] getOccupiedFields()
      Returns returns 2 dimensional boolean array presenting ship placement in format[cols][rows]

      ' Position ships, randomly
      void setShips(Ship[] ships)
      Add ships to board

        int[][] getBoardState()
        Returns table state, value 1 represents attacked squires, value 2 successful hit, value 0 unaffected sector
        Returns:
        two dimensional array with board state description
